summary: Feature request to implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes in the PHP SDK, following the specification from the features repository.
userImpact: Users will have consistent handling of Temporal built-in prefixes across all SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement special behavior for built-in prefixes as specified in the features repository issue #576
resolutionDetails: Will be exposed in RR with GoSDK implementation, indicating resolution through SDK update
keyQuote: Will be exposed in RR with GoSDK implementation
